entry.content:

entry.title: Highlights from the concert at the City MuseumÂ ğŸ¶
entry.content: Concert in memory of prof. TomaÅ¾ Lorenz, Autumn Serenades 2020 at the City Museum in Ljubljana, organized by the Ljubljana Musical Youth.

entry.title: Nova spletnaÂ stran
entry.content: ZahvaljujoÄ naÅ¡im vdanim prijateljem smo pridobili novo spletno stran, ki je odzivna in pregledna, zgrajena s pomoÄjo in okoli odprtokodnih tehnologij, prilagojena tako mobilnim kot namiznim napravam in ima izjemno nizek ogljiÄni odtis. Preverite in delite s prijatelji! <3

entry.title: NewÂ website
entry.content: Thanks to our loyal friends, we have acquired a new website, which is fast, friendly, navigable, built with open-source technologies, adapted to both mobile and desktop devices, and has an extremely low carbon footprint. Check it out and share it with friends! <3

entry.title: Koncerti v Äasu pandemije COVID-19
entry.content: Koncertiranje v Äasu pandemije COVID-19 poteka nemoteno, skladno s priporoÄili. PovpraÅ¡evanje in predloge za koncerte sprejemamo preko kontaktnega obrazca.

entry.title: Concerts during COVID-19Â pandemic
entry.content: Concerts during COVID-19 pandemic shall continue undisturbed, in accordance with recommendations. Inquiries and suggestions for concerts are accepted via the contact form.
